EmailTemplate.name: ROLL-OUT: Travel Instructions for Account Managers to Hoffman
EmailTemplate.subject: Please book airfare to Hoffman Estates for Salesforce.com Training - Instructions Below
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your classroom training session, Effective Selling Using Salesforce.com, is scheduled to be completed at the Sears Holdings Corporate Headquarters in Hoffman Estates, IL. During the week of August 9th, 2010.
You previously received a Save-the-date notification indicating the date of your training. Please plan to travel to O'Hare airport the day before training and to depart O'Hare after 6pm on the day of training.
Your hotel is being reserved in as part of a group reservation. You will receive confirmation of your hotel stay in the coming week.
Please consider the following points when making travel reservations:
Airfare needs to be booked at the most economical rate possible so please consider all practical options Rental cars should not be reserved or rented at this time, unless you are able to coordinate a group of 3 or more. Transportation will be coordinated once all air travel has been booked. If it is practical for you drive rather than fly, please do so. Please book your airfare by Friday, July 23rd. Instructions to book your travel are provided below:
STEP 1: Click Below to access the Travel Portal https://sso.searshc.com/auth.php?p=ccr (use your enterprise ID and password)
STEP 2: Click on the “Travel” Link in the Top Tool Bar *(very important!)
STEP 3: Click on "Meetings" Link in the Travel drop-down menu
STEP 4: Select the Meeting that you have been invited for (Salesforce.com Training for Account Managers, at Hoffman Estates, IL) to begin the registration and travel booking process.
STEP 5: The Meeting Registration will now begin, please follow the steps as you will be prompted. Please be concious of your arrival and departure dates and remember to book the most economical flight available.
*It's very important that you click on the Travel and Meetings Link in the Top Tool Bar AND to select this particular meeting. If you book through the regular front page of the travel web site it will not pre-fill in the pertinent meeting OR billing information for this particular meeting. There is no way to reverse a charge if you do not follow these instructions.
Thank you for your attention to this matter and your efforts in our Phase 1 launch of Salesforce.com.
Best, {!User.FirstName}
